ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer
Class RayShapeIntersection

java.lang.Object
  ch.chnoch.thesis.renderer.RayShapeIntersection

public class RayShapeIntersection
extends java.lang.Object

This is a data structure to hold information about whether an intersection between a ray and a shape occured and if yes where the hit point is.

Field Summary
 boolean hit
          A boolean that indicates whether a hit actually occurred.
 javax.vecmath.Vector3f hitPoint
          The hit point between the shape and the ray.
 Node node
          The node that holds the associated shape.

          Instantiates a new ray shape intersection.
